Ch'i Energy Products From EMF harmonisation, not feeling drained by computers to not being affected by other peoples energies, there may be some great solutions here for you...........
Ch'i Product Testimonials The following are actual comments from people that have had success in utilising the Ch'i Energy Products ..........
Healing Stories
Auric Alignment Healing Story Healing stories from a fascinating case requiring an auric alignment with crystals
CRYSTAL LIGHT BALANCING CRYSTAL LIGHT BALANCING - A WONDERFUL FORM OF ENLIGHTENED HEALING
Auric Healing Colour Wheel
Examine the Auric Healing Color wheel in the picture here, gazing into the center of the wheel.
Soon the pattern will begin to move and reflect with your auric colors- what colours are you reflecting today???
What do the different colour rays bring you.................
CLB - Usage of torch&trouble shooting A stunning new healing modality tool, these specially designed color torches are of the highest quality, read on for more information, how to utilise them&trouble shooting..............
CLB Advanced Color Healing
Healing energies of the Crystal Light Balancing Advanced Color Healing Discs
Many people have reported increased harmony, health&wellbeing, testimonials include eased aches, pains, better ability to walk, clearer minds, eased frozen joints and body mobility, Several clients have great success utilising the CLB techniques for children and animals. An essential tool of any natural health practitioner&a wonderful assistance in any household. Read on for the advanced colour healing rays.................
SOAP MAKING FORUM Have you searched for a natural soap that doesn’t strip the skin ? A soap safe for babies&the elderly ? Did you know that many soap strip the oils from the surface of the skin which takes up to 7 days to replace, during this time your skin is unprotected from the elements making it prone to premature aging&drying. Here we discuss all manner of creating perfect soaps&perhaps even works of art.........
SOAP ART FAQ's Q. My favourite !!! How much soap will 1kg make? Many other frequently asked questions on soap making&more................
How to make Lavender Soaps
Lavender is one of the most loved bathroom scents, see how easy it is to make your own lavender soaps........
Additional information and tid bits on soap making
Additional Information..... Adding Mica dust, Soap Petals for guests, Adding Botanicals, What to do with all this soap, Different Molds&do you really need that super duper $1000.00 professional mould or really would a milk carton do?
How do I make Melt&Pour soaps? Do you think soap making is difficult? Let us show you how simple it is. From a school holiday fun time with the kids, to creating your own delightfeul products and perhaps even a new business........... Our pages can take you from beginner to works of art! Check back - we will be adding new topics regularly.
What is Glycerine? Glycerin is one of the most versatile and valuable chemical substances known to man. It possesses a unique combination of physical and chemical properties that are utilized in myriad products.
What's in the Renascent Melt&Pour Soap Base ? COMPLETELY VEGAN! WE OPERATE A COLLEGE OF NATURAL THERAPIES SO WE CARE WHAT GOES INTO OUR SOAP! Read what we love about our soap here...........
Radionic Test Kits FOR REGISTERED PRACTITIONERS OF VEGA TESTING, KINESIOLOGY, PENDULUM, PULSE POINT DIAGNOSIS and NATURAL THERAPIES. The kits may also be used by SPIRITUAL OR INTUITIVE HEALERS. A wonderful tool for healers in many modalities.
Radionic Test kits&their use
Methods of use for the radionic test kits, from kinesiologists, to vega testers, intuive healers to alternative practitioners, something for all to utilise here for healing and awareness...........
Frequency Harmonisation Therapy What is Frequency Harmonisation Therapy? This therapy refers to the use of a resonator as part of treating infections, cancer and neurological problems. A resonator generates resonance waves that are transmitted either via plasma tubes or via handheld electrodes to the body. By creating a negative polarity, electromagnetic waves negate the reproductive ability of viruses, bacteria and parasites in the human body or destroy the pathogens outright.
Dental Foci (holes)&how they can affect your health A dental focus usually is a localized chronic infection that under certain circumstances may result in severe local or systemic disease.
Harmonisation Healing in the clinic
We are delighted to now offer Frequency harmonisation therapy to our clients.
What is Frequency Harmonisation Therapy?
This therapy refers to the use of a resonator as part of treating infections, cancer and neurological problems. A resonator generates resonance waves that are transmitted either via plasma tubes or via handheld electrodes to the body. By creating a negative polarity, electromagnetic waves negate the reproductive ability of viruses, bacteria and parasites in the human body or destroy the pathogens outright.
Gem&Stellar Essences Vibration Discover the healing wonders of vibrational medicine utilising the Renascent Gem&Stellar Essences. Healing from a rock? how?.......... Healing from a planetary constellation? What's that all about? Read on&discover ...............
Can I blend essences together? I think I need more than 1 essence at this time (in reading through the healing qualities, maybe I even need several). Can I blend them all together in 1 bottle ?...........
Why are these essences better than those I could make myself? Many people prepare their gem essence by taking a glass bowl outside, filling it with distilled water, placing their gem in it and leaving it there in the sun for two hours. Read on to find out why this will not work and may even be dangerous..........
What are stellar Essences? An essence made from a vibration of a planetary constellation - what's that about? ....................
Speed of Results... OK - if these essences are so cool - when I am going to see some changes..............
Students Comments from the Gem Essence Course Here are some comments from past students that completed the Renascent Gem Essence Course.........
Why use an essence not a crystal?
I have plenty of gems! Surely I can just throw them all over myself, fill my pockets, stagger up and head off and it would do the same thing......... Wouldn't it?
Maybe, maybe not - read on to discover why...........
When do I use Gem or Stellar? Gem Essences, Stellar Essences, FlowerEssences, how do I determine which one I need to use now?
Using the Charts... There are some fantastic charts in the Awaken Your energies Book on physical healing &in the Gem essence Workbook , including emotional&psychospiritual states and the corresponding gems / essences, how do I use them ?............
What is a gem Essence? Vibrational Medicine in one of its purest forms. Healing from gems, Delve into this fascinating topic, what are Gem essences?
Essence Introduction The Information here is purely for interest and it must be pointed out that we strongly recommend you consult your medical practitioner BEFORE embarking on any healing / treatment. Having said that, here is a lovely introduction to the usage of vibrational medicine..........
Essences for every use...
Essences for everyone and every occasion............
Animals, Massage, Plants, Children, Bathing, Aromatherapy, Household Use, Practitioner s. Wow you you create a healing experience in so many aspects ? .......... Read on ...........
Can I make my own gem essences?
Can I use ANY Gem Essences, Including those I Make Myself ? The in's and outs and a few things you may not have considered.............

Hip and Knees Healing Just want to let you know how much better I feel this week after a private clinic session with Daryll!.........
Kinesiology Testimonials I was found to have a growth in my uterus in November last year and this at first caused me concern as I fear I may die before I have lived my purpose here. I have been under a specialist and decided that I did not need this in my life. It was during..............
Reiki Testimonials I see the difference more than before. I feel much better.......
Medical Qigong Testimonials The environment is lovely and the teaching method is great. Ive been finding my sight improving as I thought I had myopia but am realising it may be ..............
Clinic Success I first heard of the Renascent Centre when I was approached by a stranger as I was walking my dog along a walking track in Warrandyte. Normally I wouldnt talk to a stranger, but this man persisted in talking to me, and then told me he was a healer. He quickly got my attention. After a brief chat, he told me he instinctively knew he was meant to talk to me, and said he knew of a naturopath.........
Houses of Life Testimonials Everything was fantastic, it leaves me (as usual) wanting to know more&more (which is why I ask so many questions) Lesley was very tolerant to all of my questioning V. Da Costa.......
Qigong Practical Testimonials Also, I must comment on the WuJi Qi Gong DVD. I've never done Qi Gong before, and as an introduction to it through the WuJi style I love it!...........

101 Ways to use your Xyron 101 Ways to use your Xyron. (OK - maybe not 101 - but some anyway - send your ideas in and we'll see if we can get it to 101!)
PENDULUMS, DOWSING, DIVINATION Fascinating tools of discovery. Dowsing Rods and pendulums access parts of your subconscious mind, not normally accesible in everyday life. We discover the hidden truths behind many things, including our bodies reaction to foods, emotions, thoughts. Like to know how? Read on...................
How does divining work?
So how does divining work ?
Every persons physical body is an energy system and has the ability to connect to everything around it.Read on to discover more...............
Programming a pendulum Acting on the theory that most of our subconscious is a storehouse of learned memories, be they from this lifetime or otherwise, surely we have the answers we need, if only we could easily access them...............
Auric Fields&Dowsing What are auric fields and how can I dowse for energy breaks within them.............
Using a healing Wand
Utilising a wand for an AURIC ALIGNMENT As well as our chakras, which may become out of balance for many reasons, some as simple as the foods we eat, water we drink and thoughts we think, there is another subtle body, which can become less than optimum. This subtle body is the aura .................

Youthful Skin, with radiance No matter if you are 55 and your skin isn't exactly keeping your birthday a secret or just beginning to notice the first signs of aging in your 20'-30's. We all like to look youthful&vital. Click here to learn some easy to do secrets............
Youthful Skin Tips No matter if you are 55 and your skin isnt exactly keeping your birthday a secret or just beginning to notice the first signs of aging in your 20s-30s. We all like to look youthful&vital. As we live in a society with rapidly expanding waistlines, experts have observed, many of us are losing the wrinkle battle, watching as the glow of youth disappears.
Many people feel that aging skin is inevitable, however new technologies&information will allow us to look as young as we feel. To assist in getting on the right path, several experts have been asked what really works to reduce wrinkles. The following is several ways experts advise you can make a difference.
Eye Beautifying Pen Without water, people cannot survive. Our skin needs enough moisture to maintain the normal function&then to appear hydrated, youthful&fresh. When facial skin becomes dehydrated, we develop fine lines and wrinkles and become prematurely aged. However, this is not the only cause ................. Discover what to do about it..............
Feng Shui Forum General questions&feedback on this fascinating topic from beginners to the most recent masters discussions
How do I pronounce Feng Shui? Feng Shui is pronounced Foong Schway in Mandarin. Sort of like sway ing in the breeze.
What is Southern Hemisphere Feng Shui? Recently we have received quite a few questions regarding classic feng shui and southern hemisphere feng shui.
If you are interested in some of what is going on, we would like to express a few viewpoints for you to consider.
What is Feng Shui? Feng Shui (Fung-Shway) is the study of Feng (wind) and Shui (water) and refers to the dispersal by wind and the gathering by water.
What is a Sha ? (Bad Energy) Not all influences that enter our environments are beneficial and good for us. Just as we have Chi (good energy) flowing throughout, we can also have Sha energy....
HEALTH RELATED ISSUES Many interesting and informative articles to challenge, make you laugh or even cry maybe.........
Aspartame SWEET POISON A MUST READ
In October of 2001, my sister started getting v ery sick. She had stomach spasms and she was having a hard time getting around. Walking was a major chore. It took everything she had just to get out of bed; she was in so much pain. By March 2002, she had undergone several tissue and muscle biopsies.............
Bicarb/Maple Syrup Cancer treatment An Italian oncologist, Dr. Tullio Simoncini, has devised a simple, very inexpensive and apparently frequently effective cancer treatment centered around the use of sodium bicarbonate, taken orally or by infusion. This baking soda treatment is based on the revolutionary thesis that "Cancer Is a Fungus" (also the title of Dr. Simoncini's book). Sodium bicarbonate administered directly on the neoplastic masses is said to destroy the fungal colonies.........

Canola Oil Dangers In 1996, the Japanese announced a study wherein a special Canola oil diet had actually killed laboratory animals. Reacting to this unpublished, but verified and startling information, a duplicate study was conducted by Canadian scientists using piglets and a Canola oil based milk replacer diet............
Diabetes The liver, adrenals, and pancreas regulate blood sugar, which is fuel for cells and the brain's only fuel.
When blood sugar is too low the adrenals stimulate the liver to release glycogen (dried glucose)........

Junk Food hard to Swallow There is something to be said about fast food being more convenient then healthy food that helps you be thin. I will give you that. But wait, how about this. Convenient when? It is definitely convenient now. How about later, when you don't have enough energy to do anything but go to sleep.............
Levels of Healthy Living.. Different levels of eating healthy. Some simple action steps that you can do to begin eating healthy without spending a lot of extra money or time all the way up to the max level of eating healthily.............
Life Long&Well What You Need to Know About Fat to Live Long, Lean, and Health I believe the very premise behind "low-fat" and "low-carb" diets is bunk. They both totally miss the point. If you want to optimize your weight and perfect your health, you should focus on the TYPE of fats and carbs you eat. Your goal should be to eat "good fats" and "good carbs" and avoid those that are unhealthy.........
